title: Introduction to Theory
description: Rigorous treatment of theory theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Introduction to Methods
description: Interdisciplinary approach to methods combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Intermediate Applications
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of applications. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Practice
description: In-depth analysis of practice principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Seminar
description: Rigorous treatment of seminar theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Analysis
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of analysis. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Methods
description: Advanced exploration of methods covering current research and industry practices.

title: Special Topics in Methods
description: Advanced exploration of methods covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: KINE 334 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Applications
description: Advanced exploration of applications covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: KINE 385 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Analysis
description: Rigorous treatment of analysis theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: KINE 326 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Seminar
description: Rigorous treatment of seminar theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: KINE 388 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Analysis
description: Rigorous treatment of analysis theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: KINE 350 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Workshop
description: Interdisciplinary approach to workshop combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: KINE 327 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Applications
description: Interdisciplinary approach to applications combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: KINE 326 and senior standing or graduate status
